notice.explanation: A translation of the PDTREE module of Garland et al.'s Phenotypic Diversity Analysis Programs. This package provides scatterplots for correlation of contrasts, diagnostics, and statistics related to root reconstructions. It also provides a small library of additional branch length transforms (e.g., Pagel's arbitrary method, Grafen's arbitrary method, Grafen's rho transform) and support for import and export of the PDI format of Garland et. al. 1993.
